item.value: The closest planet to earth is Venus. It would take over 4 years to travel there by plane.
The blue whale is the largest known animal on Earth. The second largest animal is the Afican elephant.
Mount McKinley in Alaska in the highest mountain in America. It is 20,320 ft high.
The longest word in a major English dictionary is 'Pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis'. It is 45 characters long.
The biggest planet in the Solar System is Jupiter. It is 317 times as heavy as the earth
Steve Wozniak designed the first Apple computer in 1976. It was known as the Apple I.
Roughly 70 percent of an adult's body is made up of water.
The average distance from the earth to the Sun is 150 million kilometers (93 million miles). If you could travel from Earth to the Sun in a plane it would take you 17 years
The blue whale is the largest known animal on Earth. The second largest animal is the Afican elephant.
The blue whale can produce sounds up to 188 decibels. This is the loudest sound produced by a living animal and has been detected as far away as 530 miles.
The longest recorded flight of a chicken is thirteen seconds
The world's population grows by over 100 million each year.
On July 20, 1969, Neil Armstrong became the first human to step on the moon.
There are more than 2,700 languages in the world. There are also more than 7,000 dialects. A dialect is a regional language variation with different pronunciation, vocabulary, or meaning.
The Universe is about 14 billion years old. The earth is only 4.6 billion years old.
Elephants demonstrate concern for members of their families they take care of weak or injured members and appear to grieve over a dead companion.
The biggest earthquake ever recorded occurred in Chile, in 1960. It measured 9.5 on the Richter scale.
The tallest building in America is the Willius Tower in Chicago.
The first 'talkie' movie was Al Jolson's The Jazz Singer released in 1927.
The Cheetah is the fastest land animal. It can run at 112 kilometres per hour (70 mph). The average person can run from 12 - 17 miles an hour in sprints, so keep away from cheetahs.
